oneOf.description: None
Calibration of Analog Sensor Inputs and Analog outputs are missing - default calibration being used
Corrupt firmware files have been detected - re-provisioning necessary
IO Board and CPU Board do not match factory pairing
IO Board programmed model does not match actual hardware
Local Display on thermostat failed to initialize
Touchscreen is not functioning properly
USB device is malfunctioning and drawing too much current
Remote ZNT Sensor has failed - check sensor. Reset Sensors from Control Setup/Inputs menu if intentional
Supply Temperature Sensor has failed - check sensor. Reset Sensors from Control Setup/Inputs menu if intentional
Outdoor Air Temperature Sensor has failed - check sensor. Reset Sensors from Control Setup/Inputs menu if intentional
Onboard Zone Temperature/Humidity Sensor has failed - contact technical support for service
Temperature Lockouts disabled due to unreliable outdoor air temperature
Economizer is unavailable due to unreliable outdoor air temperature. Connect or check wiring of Outdoor Temp Sensor
Dehumidification is unavailable due to unreliable zone humidity
General equipment service warning
Dirty Filter service warning
Unable to detect supply temp to determine if in heating or cooling mode. Connect or check wiring of Supply Temp Sensor
Control shut down due to unreliable zone temperature - contact technical support for service
Control shut down due to open window binary input. Close window or reconfigure binary inputs
Control shut down due to lack of airflow proof. Check airflow sensor connection and then press Confirm to try again
Onboard Humidity Sensor has failed or Network override has timed out
Supply Fan Status feedback not proving
Supply Fan Runtime limit exceeded.  Please service the Supply Fan.
Heating Ineffective.  Heating has failed to increase the supply temperature more than two degrees.
Cooling Ineffective.  Cooling has failed to decrease the supply temperature more than two degrees.
Zone Temperature Too Cold.  The zone temperature is below the lower temperature limit.
Zone Temperature Too Hot.  The zone temperature is above the upper temperature limit.
